name: Stop Stabbing People
description:
In Stop Stabbing People you either stop your friend from stabbing you or be the friend that stabs you! 

Made for a senior project in about four months, Stop Stabbing People was made to be a two-player party game where one player seeks to find and kill the other in a crowd while avoiding getting killed themselves.

Play as one of two characters:

The Wizard: 

An accredited wizard now retired for more than 2000 years, The Wizard's now lazy life is jeopardized when their broken-down mansion deep in the woods is put under attack by curious adventurers of modern time.

  • Use your magic to stop time and cast lightning.
  • Use abilities to detect and eliminate The Stabber.

The Stabber:

One of two adventurers that got a little too curious, The Stabber has been possessed by a cursed dagger, and now holds murderous intent!  Since their friend had found their way into The Wizard's Potions of Duplication, it is also much easier to get away with murder in a sea of identical friends.

  • Use your similar likeness to the many clones to blend into the crowd.
  • Use abilities to avoid detection and close the gap on The Wizard
  • Kill The Wizard directly, or create enough bloodshed to attract The Vampire Frog!

PC Controls:

The Wizard:

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Right Click - Freeze time and aim an attack
  • Left Click -Fire when time is frozen, killing the target if in range
  • Right Shift - Use Ability 1
  • Right Control - Use Ability 2

The Stabber:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Stab
  • Shift - Use Ability 1
  • E - Use Ability 2

Music by Kevin Macleod, licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution4.0 License.  Sounds primarily found from freesound.org under the Creative Commons 0 License. All art created by me, with some effects created using Pixel FX Designer.

I plan to make an updated version later for Steam, so if there are any bugs or issues, please let me know!

Thanks, and have fun!
